title: Kale, Apple, and Almond Chicken Salad
directions: Combine oil, rind, juice, thyme, mustard, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper in a bowl, stirring with a whisk. Place 1 tablespoon juice mixture in a large ziplock plastic bag; reserve remaining juice mixture. Add chicken to bag; seal bag. Let stand at room temperature 10 minutes, turning bag occasionally.

Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Remove chicken from marinade; discard marinade. Pat chicken dry. Sprinkle chicken with remaining 1/8 teaspoon salt. Add chicken to pan; cook 5 minutes on each side or until done. Place chicken on a cutting board; let stand 5 minutes. Cut across the grain into thin slices.

Combine kale, carrots, celery, and apple in large bowl. Add remaining juice mixture; toss to coat. Divide kale mixture evenly among 2 plates; top evenly with chicken. Sprinkle with almonds and remaining 1/8 teaspoon pepper.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided
1 medium carrot, peeled and thinly sliced diagonally
1/2 apple, halved and cut into 1/4-in.-thick slices
